item.title: LouderVoice joins forces with US Leaders in Social Solutions for Food Services Industry
item.description:
We are more than a little pleased to announce this.

American + Ireland Social Media Leaders Join Forces

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: San Jose, CA; Austin, TX; and Cork, Ireland: July 3, 2012 â€“ Three Social Media leaders have come together to offer a compelling solution for restaurants and foodservice companies, beginning in the US. FohBoh.com of San Jose, CA, LouderVoice Reviews of Cork, Ireland, and Restaurant Domain of Austin, TX, can now provide a complete online Social solution to the food industry.
